data.actual_result: Reaction modal scales improperly, showing all the users, and stretches off screen, not allowing you to view other reactions
data.expected_result: Reaction modal scales properly and allows you to scroll
data.short_description: Reactions modal scales improperly on Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a bunch of people to add reactions to a message (Make sure that one reaction has at least 25 reactions on it) - View the reactions and make sure you're viewing one with a small number of reactions - Click on the reaction with at least 25 reactions - Observe the reactions modal
